about_the_game:
Get ready to live the real FPS Arena experience. In this game you will be able to face other players with many weapons in a large map.

The game allows you to play free-for-all multiplayer games in an arena equipped with different weapons and pick-ups. 

Compared to the first versions of the game, many bugs have been corrected and in the future further updates may be released to resolve them and to modify and expand the current map, as well as adding new weapons and improving various aspects of the gameplay. 

You can report any problem to the email address specified in the support section. 

Currently it is possible to play exclusively with mouse and keyboard but there is the possibility that Gamepad support will be added. 

What can I say? Jump into the fray and challenge your friends. Who will be the best?

name: ArenaWar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850 (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-2400S or 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon R9 290X or better (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
